name: oneluckidevNuspecRefUpdate
description: Updates the NuGet Dependency References in the Nuspec file based on the NuGet packages that the project references.  Keeps references in Sync.
author: Jeff Przylucki

inputs.name: nuspecFile
inputs.label: Nuspec file to be updated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Nuspec file to update the dependencies section on.

inputs.name: projectFile
inputs.label: Project to read dependencies from:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Project file that contains NuGet Package references that need to be set in the Nuspec
